title: Maxine Waters Says Zuckerberg Should Testify on Crypto
itunes:title: Maxine Waters Says Zuckerberg Should Testify on Crypto
description:
Kevin spoke to House Financial Services Committee Chairwoman Maxine Waters, a California Democrat about Facebook’s planned cryptocurrency, Libra.

Kevin also discussed Libra with Congressman French Hill, a Republican from Arkansas, who is member of the House Financial Services Committee.

Panel guests include:Bill Cunningham, Founder of Creative Investment Research and Alex Bolton, Congressional reporter at the Hill.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
